trans_title: 激光干涉引力波天文台纪录片计划
introduction: https://vimeo.com/ligofilmsThe Advanced LIGO Documentary Project is a collaboration among Caltech, MIT, the LIGO Laboratory and director Les Guthman that has made the feature documentary, “LIGO,” and an eight-part video series, THE DISCOVERY THAT SHOOK THE WORLD, about LIGO’s major gravitational wave discoveries 2015-2017 and the birth of the new era of gravitational wave astronomy. The documentary was completed in April 2019.
chinese_title: 激光干涉引力波天文台纪录片计划
